name: GEARS STORY
description:
No Choices, No Branches, No Multiple Endings

All you can do is choose places to visit and progress through a fantasy story that concludes in about an hour.

Earn Your Secret Stash Through Daily Work

You tackle your job as a mechanic through a "Gear Maze Minigame."
Use the secret stash earned from work to unlock helper features for solving complex mazes.

Features

  • Short duration (2-3 hours)
  • Currency and minigame system
  • Achievements
  • Retro pixel art

Story

The setting is the "Defensive Nation Melkid," embroiled in an ongoing war with mysterious monsters known as "Mamono."
Having lost her mother at a young age, Eshina lives her life as a mechanic alongside her imaginary friend, Jeena.
One day, Eshina's chance encounter with the prisoner Teresha leads her into the dark underbelly of the nation...

A short novel that blends a commoner's story of "working and living as a mechanic" with elements of war and science fiction.
